title: Disney shocker: Robert Iger to return as CEO, Bob Chapek ousted
text:
"Mr. Iger has the deep respect of Disney's senior leadership team, most of whom he worked closely with until his departure as executive chairman 11 months ago, and he is greatly admired by Disney employees worldwideâ€“all of which will allow for a seamless transition of leadership," she said.

This is a developing story that will be updated.

Disney shocker: Robert Iger to return as CEO, Bob Chapek ousted
